description: Alice announces three scheduling changes: create a design review, update sprint planning time, and cancel the retrospective. Tests mixed create+update+delete in one conversation.

events.title: Design Review
events.reasoning: Alice sets up a new design review on Wednesday at 2 PM in the design lab. Bob and Carol both confirm the time works.
events.assumptions: Assumed 1-hour duration as no end time was specified

events.title: Sprint Planning
events.reasoning: Alice moves sprint planning from Thursday at 9 AM to Friday at 10 AM because the product team needs more time. Bob confirms. Matches calendar event [1].
events.assumptions: Duration kept the same as original (1 hour)

events.title: Retrospective
events.reasoning: Alice cancels the retrospective on Friday at 3 PM, saying it will be rolled into next week's session. Carol confirms. Matches calendar event [2].

mock_llm_response.summary: Three scheduling changes: new design review Wednesday at 2 PM, sprint planning moved to Friday at 10 AM, and Friday retrospective cancelled.

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18. 'Wednesday at 2 PM' = today Feb 18 at 14:00. Sprint planning moves from Thursday (Feb 19) to Friday (Feb 20) at 10 AM. Retrospective on Friday (Feb 20) at 3 PM is cancelled.
